sentences.english: Summer heat, has been out of bud and leaf stems.
sentences.chinese: 夏日炎炎，芽已抽出莖和葉。

sentences.english: Each day – even during the sweltering summer – thousands of visitors waited in long lines to enter Futurama.
sentences.chinese: 雖然烈日炎炎，但每天都有數千人大排長龍等待參觀。

sentences.english: Summer is hot and days are long.
Sorching midsummer, choosing a few trendy sunglass is first selection important matter.
sentences.chinese: 炎炎盛夏，選幾款新潮的太陽鏡是首選大事。

sentences.english: Summer is not and the days are long.
Cheguo clothes for me just cover the scorching sun.
sentences.chinese: 只是扯過衣衫爲我遮住這烈日炎炎。

sentences.english: Sorching summer, choose here and nature zero distance contact.
sentences.chinese: 炎炎夏日，選擇這裏與大自然零距離接觸。

sentences.english: While Summer is good for well sleeping.
The scorching sun makes one breathless, we really hope that it rains.
sentences.chinese: 炎炎夏日烤得人喘不過氣來，大家真希望能下場雨呀。

sentences.english: We tubed down the river on a hot summer day.
sentences.chinese: 我們在炎炎烈日下在這條河裏埋管道。

sentences.english: In a summer of seething heat, a parasol becomes a necessity for ladies.
sentences.chinese: 炎炎夏日，陽傘成爲女士們外出時的必帶物品。

sentences.english: In the summer months the temperature shoots right up and the sun beats down from a blue, cloudless sky.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季，溫度會陡然升高，晴空無雲，烈日炎炎。

sentences.english: It's autumn, but recently still cool, hot.
sentences.chinese: 雖已入秋，但前陣子依舊酷日炎炎。

sentences.english: Perfect wines for a summer day.
That weather is very hot, Chiri hothead.
sentences.chinese: 那天天氣很熱，赤日炎炎。

sentences.english: Peasants are busy weeding under the scorching sun.
sentences.chinese: 農民在赤日炎炎下忙着除草。

definition: Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
three periods forming the hottest periods of summer, from mid-July to mid-August, namely: 初伏 (mid-July), 中伏 (late July to early August), 末伏 (mid-August)
the hottest period of the year/see 三伏天[san1 fu2 tian1]
